entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove ServiceHub PackageReferences #71374
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Scripting throws exception in .Net 8 Standalone Blazor Wasm #71371
  • InvalidProgramException when returning a ref field assignment in a property #71369

Closed

  • Can not get compilation object for web aplications #71302
  • Roslyn SemanticModel symbol resolution not working reliably #71370
  • IDE0028 suggests to refactor empty collection expressions #71245

PullRequests

Created

  • Offer use-collection-expr when targeting interfaces #71373
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [Draft] LSP Public API #71372
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Use new helper type for initializing a value type field only once, and in a threadsafe manner. #71013
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • IOperation - drop synthesized conversion placed on top of params collections #71325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Simplify code for checking assignments #71368
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue when using a collection expr within object/collection intializers #71367
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add error logging to RequestContext #71366
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extract compilation-tracker/SG-production code out of SolutionState to a new owner. #71257
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and… #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Inline Rename] Update the UI related to Copilot #71332
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • WIP. Indenting string builder with generator #71364
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add razor diagnostic endpoint #71365
    Area-IDE, untriaged
